mapper.update: update tbl_board set readcnt = readcnt+1 where stock_idx = #{stock_idx}
update tbl_board set suggestion = suggestion+1 where stock_idx = #{stock_idx}

choose.when: select * from tbl_board where subject like concat('%',#{key},'%') order by regdate desc
select * from tbl_board where user_name like concat('%',#{key},'%') order by regdate desc
select * from tbl_board where content like concat('%',#{key},'%') order by regdate desc
select * from tbl_board where stock_sector like concat('%',#{key},'%')

mapper.select: select image from tbl_board where stock_idx = #{stock_idx}

choose.when: select * from tbl_board where stock_sector like concat('%',#{key},'%') and stock_name like concat('%',#{subkey},'%')

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(stock_idx,stock_sector,stock_name, stock_number, user_name, content, imageName, fileName, subject, regdate) values(#{stock_idx}, #{stock_sector}, #{stock_name}, #{stock_number}, #{user_name}, #{content}, #{imageName}, #{fileName}, #{subject}, now())
mapper.update: update tbl_board set subject=#{subject}, email=#{email}, contents=#{contents} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT hex(imageFiles) from tbl_board where stock_idx = #{stock_idx}
